The Udupi City Bus Stand is a major transportation hub located in the city of Udupi.
It serves as a central point for various bus routes within the city and connecting to nearby towns and villages.
The Udupi City Bus Stand is situated in the heart of the city, typically in a central or easily accessible area.

Udupi Railway Station is a major railway station located in Udupi district of Karnataka, India. It is situated on the Konkan Railway line, which connects Mangalore in Karnataka with Mumbai in Maharashtra.

Udupi Railway Station is well-connected to various cities and towns across the country. It is served by numerous trains operated by Indian Railways, catering to both long-distance and local commuters.

Some of the important trains that pass through or originate from Udupi Railway Station include the Matsyagandha Express, Mangalore-Mumbai Superfast Express, Kochuveli-Porbandar Express, and Karwar-Mumbai Matsyagandha Express.

The station itself is equipped with basic passenger amenities such as waiting halls, ticket counters, refreshment stalls, and restroom facilities. Additionally, there are taxi and auto-rickshaw services available outside the station premises for local transportation.
